accuracy.description: The correctness of the final answer provided by the agent.

reasoning_depth.description: The depth and complexity of the reasoning process used by the agent to arrive at the solution.

steps_efficiency.description: The number of steps taken by the agent to reach the solution and its efficiency in reaching the answer.

reasoning_traceability.description: The ability to follow and understand the reasoning process of the agent.

solution_uniqueness.description: The uniqueness of the solution provided, assessing whether the solution is a generic response or tailored to the specific question.

robustness_to_variability.description: The robustness of the solution when faced with diverse and varying input questions.

problem_comprehension.description: The accuracy with which the agent understands the problem constraints and premises.

strategy_optimality.description: The optimality of the strategy or algorithm used to solve the problem.

execution_time.description: The time taken by the agent to execute the tasks and produce a solution.

solution_complexity.description: The complexity of the solution in terms of the resources used and the sophistication of the algorithm or model.
